class.name: computed_torque_controllers/PositionJointController
class.description: This controller subscribes position command in joint space. The controller expects a hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface for controlled joints and a hardware_interface::JointStateInterface for all other joints as a hardware interface.

class.name: computed_torque_controllers/VelocityJointController
class.description: This controller subscribes velocity command in joint space. The controller expects a hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface for controlled joints and a hardware_interface::JointStateInterface for all other joints as a hardware interface.

class.name: computed_torque_controllers/VelocityTaskSpaceController
class.description: This controller subscribes velocity command in task space. The controller expects a hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface for controlled joints and a hardware_interface::JointStateInterface for all other joints as a hardware interface.
